stories.text:
Can you give me the URL of a HN article, published between March and January (both inclusive), bound to an article written by a spy that explained how to get people to like you and influence them please? (A spy or someone working in the secret service of a country)

I think I remember one of the things he advised was to make people feel like they were making a choice.
